Publish.LongDescription: With this mod you can hide notiifcations based on settings. This mod should be safe to remove at any time but it is higly recommended to make a backup of your savegame beore using this mod. Only these notifications are hidden: - Dead End - No Vehicles - No Workers - No Homes - Overpopulation - Underutilized Space - Poor Infrastructure - High Maintenance Costs - Building Integrity Compromised - Structural Weakness - Fire Hazard - Flood Risk - Landslide Risk - Earthquake Damage - Tornado Damage - Tsunami Damage - Blizzard Damage - Drought Notification - Overheating Notification - Frost Damage - Wildlife Infestation - Pest Infestation - Crops Withered - Livestock Disease - Factory Shutdown - Market Collapse - Resource Depleted - Supply Chain Broken - Export Blocked - Import Blocked - Traffic Jam - Congestion Alert - Overcrowded Public Transport - Understaffed Services - Emergency Response Delay - Healthcare Overwhelmed - Education Underfunded - Energy Crisis - Resource Scarcity - Water Shortage - Sewage Overflow - Pollution Threshold Exceeded - Noise Threshold Exceeded - Air Quality Hazard - Ground Contamination - Habitat Loss - Biodiversity Threat - Ecosystem Collapse - Urban Sprawl - Zoning Conflict - Planning Permission Denied - Construction Halted - Financial Insolvency - Budget Deficit - Bankruptcy Warning - Tax Revenue Shortfall - Inflation Alert - Crime Wave - Civil Unrest - Protest Notification - Strike Notification - Riot Damage - Vandalism Alert - Arson Incident - Theft Notification - Cyber Attack Notification - Security Breach - Illegal Activity Detected - Black Market Alert - Smuggling Alert - Espionage Detected - Sabotage Warning

ChangeLog.Value: Remove more important notification from the mod to be shown
